title: fromeroad
description: Fictional social media platform for the employees of Adelaide's Lot Fourteen on Frome road.Allowing users to post, comment, and share their interests with a weekly points leaderboard. Integrating React, Node Express, MySQL, all hosted on AWS.

title: zeile
description: Real-time forum style chat room where all users share the same floor. Utilising Google Firebase snapshots for realtime updates in the database and serving users instantly.

title: shareio
description: File upload, download, and storage service hosted on Azure

title: blog
description: Serverless personal blog where I share development updates about random projects I am working on.
